message.content: {"given_definition_quality":50,"better_definition":"time; a period or moment","sentence":"时间很重要。","image_prompt":"A softly animated, apocalyptic cityscape at dusk, with a large antique clock in the center, time visibly ticking, and gentle rays of light breaking through partially ruined buildings, evoking a poetic sense of time's passage, in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"Time is important."}
